# thunder_system_ext_only_logging (Resource)

`thunder_system_ext_only_logging`: Configure external only logging

__PLACEHOLDER__

## Example Usage

```terraform

}

}
```

## Schema

### Optional

- `enable` (Number) enable external only logging for packet driven DDOS logs
